name: Treeway Sprint
description: This is a game about running in a autumnal treeway. It is an infinte runner so good luck finding the end. You are running from a caterpiller that doesn't want you in its forests. Use A and the D key to move left and right and also use Spacebar to jump.  Avoid the leaf piles and collect the coins. Survive for as long as possible. Good luck. Post your highscores in the comments.
